q: Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a post on href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> Google's Blog, referring to himself, Larry Page , and Sergey Brin . This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. As a result, Larry Page will lead product development and technology strategy within Google and take over Eric Schmidt 's day-to-day role as CEO starting April 4. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt will focus on deals, partnerships,
